post.title: fs: factory unlocked iphone 3gs black 32gb
post.content: i am selling my factory unlocked iphone 3gs 32gb black unlocked purchased here in guam, usa from carrier docomo pacific phone is in near perfect condition it's been in a case since out of the box will include box cable and charger i am paypal verified price is $750 you pay shipping you pay before i ship. simple as that. don't like it? you don't have to purchase from me.
